title: Bug 139388Tooltip keeps displaying after mouse click and can find no way to make it disappear.
description: Description:Tooltip keeps displaying after mouse click and can find no way to make it disappear.Steps to reproduce:1. Insert a chart2. Add interactivity for it so that when mouse click chart area, tooltip shows3. Preview, and click mouse in chart areaResult:Tooltip shows always.I can find no way to make tooltip disappear.
